Assault_Strike.help: You deliver a pair of lightning fast blows to your opponent in an effort to throw them off balance, causing smashing damage. This attack can also bruise your target, reducing their defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
Your defenses have been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Heavy_Blow.help: You strike your target with a powerful punch, causing smashing damage. This punch is powerful enough that it can knock a target down.
Heavy_Blow.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Throwing_Knives.help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Agile_Cross.help: You execute a sweeping right hook that can strike multiple targets in your frontal arc. This attack will cause smashing damage. The force of the attack causes trauma, which causes minor lethal damage and reduced regeneration and recovery rates.
Agile_Cross.shortHelp: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Lethal), Chance for -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe)
Agile_Cross.targetHelp: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. Your regeneration and recovery are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
Your regeneration and recovery have been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Concussive_Blow.help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
Concussive_Blow.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), Chance for Stun(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -DMG(Foe,All)
Concussive_Blow.targetHelp: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, reducing your damage, chance to hit and attack speed.

Fearsome_Blow.help: You strike your target with a spinning attack that lands two blows in quick succession. The blows cause smashing damage and are forceful enough to occasionally knock your target down. Additionally, there is a chance that the attack may cause your target to be afraid.
Fearsome_Blow.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown(Foe), Fear(Foe)

Rallying_Cry.help: You strike the ground with tremendous force, causing a shockwave of energy that blasts foes around you. All targets nearby suffer smashing damage and minor lethal damage, and may also be knocked back. Additionally, some targets will suffer a minor concussion from the attack, reducing their chance to hit, attack speed and damage.
Rallying_Cry.shortHelp: PBAoE, Buff(Self and Allies), +DMG(All), +ToHit, +RES(All Status Effects), +Prot(All Status Effects)
Rallying_Cry.targetHelp: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, reducing your damage, chance to hit and attack speed.

Shattering_Uppercut.help: You strike your target with a powerful uppercut that knocks them into the air. The force of the blow hits for smashing damage and causes trauma for additional lethal damage. The affected target is unable to fly for a short period and suffers reduced defenses. Finally, the target may be confused or stunned after recovering from being knocked into the air.
Shattering_Uppercut.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe), -DEF(All,Foe), Chance for Confuse OR Stun(Foe)
Shattering_Uppercut.targetHelp: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. You may also have a slight concussion, causing confusion or disorientation.
Shattering_Uppercut.targetShortHelp: DoT(Lethal), -DEF(All), Chance for Confuse or Stun
